titleStmt.title: The voice of Michael the archangel, to his Highness the Lord Protector: for the salvation of himself and the three nations. / Presented by Arise Evans.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Arise, b. 1607.

publicationStmt.date: Printed 1653. or as the vulgar think it, 1654.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
